string.value: Blake has a dream...but he wants you to talk to him about it in a little bit, since he's in the middle of something.
Blake wants to be a singer! Will his dream come true? Talk to #bLana#k the CEO of Big Hit Records. She's shopping in Kerning Square.
Will Blake's dream ever come true?

Hello, my name is Blake and I'm a public service worker in charge of Kerning Square's Lost and Found. Currently, my job is to find lost belongings and return them to their owners, but I have bigger and better things planned. Would you like to hear my dream?

My dream is to become a famous singer and perform at the new concert hall in Kerning Square! I had an audition with Big Hit Records, and I just know the CEO will give me a chance to perform there one of these days. I'm on duty so could you, #b#h0##k, talk to #bLana#k of Big Hit Records and put in a good word? She's out shopping today.

Are you here to become a star? But your sense of style is all wrong. Tsk. \r\n#L0##b(How rude! If it weren't for Blake... Argh...) No, I am not here to be a star, ahem. I'm here for Blake, the public service worker at the subway station in Kerning Square.#l\n#k
Oh, right. Blake. That boy's got talent. \r\n#L0##bBlake says his dream is to perform in Kerning Square. Could you give him a chance?#l\n#k
Hm, I'll have to think about it. I'm not sure he's ready to make his debut just yet.
Give me some time to think.
You haven't talked to Lana, the CEO of Big Hit Records, yet? I'm sure you'll find her if you go up those stairs and enter the Shopping Center.
